name: Vigreen
0:
”Alexa, start control device and turn on the light”
”Alexa, start control device and turn off the light”
”Alexa, launch control device”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: control device
des:
This skill to control Vigreen devices (switch) using voice. 
Only say: "Alexa, ask control device" and " Alexa, turn on the device tag" or "Alexa, ask control device to turn on the device tag".
Note: The users must log in to the vigreen account to use the skill.
